lines.speaker: Wife
text: You seem distracted, little bird. Aren't you going to practice your Overdrive combo?

lines.speaker: Hero
text: There's no point. It's not powerful enough.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: Sigh... you always were so dramatic.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: That'll have to do. Now, just in case you've forgotten, you can arm-wrestle by mashing A and D as quickly as you can.
At the same time, you can use the arrow keys to activate your Overdrive combos. Let's give it a try!
